content: .http://www.google.com/hostednews/afp/article/ALeqM5hpSIzLAZiJ7Wi5ooQODEv5PqwMEA Hezbolleh is spending $400 million to rebuild the homes destroyed in the Israeli attack on Lebanon. The project which will reconstruct 240 apartment complexes and restore more than 900 others. The work will take another 18 months. Funding for the work is not coming through western or Lebanese sources and it is believed Iran might be paying for it. The US may be assisting the Lebanese government which has laid out #100 million in support payments for damage. But it is a virtual certainty that some of the $20 billion in US assistance to Israel will be used to demolish these buildings again in the next round.
